creator: jonforck@gmail.com
text:
I have written 2 addition tasks for ant that I think are pretty useful.  One
creates a new Clearcase view and the other removes a clearcase view.  This form
does not have a place for me to attach them for consideration.  

If possible I would like to add these to the project.  I can be contacted at
jonforck@gmail.com

Created attachment 16666
cccreateview task

This is the create view task.
creator: jonforck@gmail.com
jonforck@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 16667
ccremoveview task

A task that removes a clearcase view.
